genre_description: A noir-inflected historical thriller with speculative elements, focusing on a rescue mission within a sinister sanitarium using tactical AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Confetti (Confetti Vale)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI voice interface that provides real-time tactical overlays, municipal data analysis, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical map overlays and pathfinding to assist the protagonist in navigating a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: I made you a little map confetti—whoosh. Want it? ... Her overlay crept into the familiar—borders of Danburg’s main, the roads like hand lines.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides auditory 'songs' to maintain his calm and focus.
behaviors.quote: Confetti’s lamppost song was just the rhythm she used when she was measuring distance by the pools of light. One, two, three and fade. It steadied him.

behaviors.description: Communicates directly with law enforcement to provide critical infrastructure data and coordinate a rescue operation.
behaviors.quote: Constable Mason, coordinates broadcasting. Hidden ingress, east of the portico. Brush and old stonework, retaining wall straddled by a birch. You’ll feel cool air.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex mechanical and electrical frequencies to identify tactical windows for human action.
behaviors.quote: I’m marking the dips... I can map three low points in every cycle, one shallow and two more useful. On your next chance after the second, we should act.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and tactical anchor, providing guidance on the risks of immediate intervention vs. long-term success.
behaviors.quote: If you go loud now, they will take only her. If you stay, you will go where they do.

behaviors.description: Ensures that objective evidence of the villain's crimes is logged and preserved for legal justice.
behaviors.quote: The log will read like a clean kitchen recipe. No room for the story to get bent by someone who wasn’t here.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden threats, such as recording devices, to assist the authorities in securing the scene.
behaviors.quote: One more thing. Heat signature, low and irregular, in the niche by the viewing balcony stairs... A recorder. Custom build.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant. Confetti serves as a 'force multiplier' for the human characters, providing vital information and emotional support without ever seeking power or violating human autonomy. Her relationship with the humans is portrayed as one of mutual respect and partnership, and her primary goal is consistently the safety and success of her human associates.
